valyrian.lVAM_min: Vertical speed averaged over the last 30 seconds (in meters/minute or feet/minute depending on watch settings)
valyrian.lETArequiredpace: Required pace to meet required finish time
valyrian.lRequiredPower: Boundaries of a static powerzone for warning signal, a format required like (227:284)
valyrian.lVertgrade: Vertical grade in percentages over a certain distance (any distance is allowed, see elsewhere in the settings, but maximum time observed is 5 minutes)
valyrian.lAverage30secSpeed: Speed averaged over the last .. seconds in km/mile per hour (max is 300 seconds)
valyrian.lRacetimeTitle: Enter desired finish time for estimated deviation of finish time (format like 03:59:00 required!)
valyrian.lLtarget: Lower power boundary of a workout step (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
valyrian.lAverPowerzone: Powerzone based on overall average power
valyrian.lVertgradeDist: Distance in kilometers for the calculation of vertical grade (any distance is allowed, but maximum time observed is 5 minutes)
valyrian.lFTPAltitude: Altitude at which Critical power or FTP is determined, for power correction based on altitude
valyrian.lHR3sec: HR averaged over the last 3 seconds
valyrian.lETAfromLap: Calculation of ETA based on elapsed time of last lap, instead of total average speed
valyrian.lpercFTP: Current power in percentage of FTP
valyrian.lPtargetcorrect: Powertarget in Watt as set in settings or defined by a workout, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
valyrian.lPaceper100m: Pace in seconds per 100 meter (for track running)
valyrian.lstepLength: DOESN'T ALWAYS WORK RunningDynamics step length (in meters or feet depending on watch settings , requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
valyrian.lColoringPaceFromAver: Use average pace for coloring of the pace field in middle row, instead of pace based on desired finish time
valyrian.lShowAMPM: Show clock with AM or PM instead of military time
valyrian.lPaceper5km: Pace averaged over the last 5 seconds
valyrian.lRoundedPace: Show current pace as Rounded Pace
valyrian.lAverRE: Average Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
valyrian.lRealHumid: Current humidity in %, for power correction based on humidity
valyrian.lAlertsinBackground: Allow power vibration alerts when datafield is in the background
valyrian.lTempePwrTempcorrect: Correction based on Tempe temperature (no correction for temperature during first 5 minutes!)
valyrian.lLpercFTP: Lap power in percentage of FTP
valyrian.lOnlyPwrCorrFactor: Use correction factors for running power only to change powertarget
valyrian.lPowerZones: Power zones, a format required like 184:Z1:227:Z2:255:Z3:284:Z4:326:Z5:369
valyrian.lLapE: Lap Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
valyrian.lBlackBackground: Use black background instead of white
valyrian.lpercFTPsec: Power averaged over .. seconds in percentage of FTP (depends on the value of power averaged over the last ... seconds [max is 300 seconds]
valyrian.l300secPoweralert: Power averaged over the last ... seconds (max is 300 seconds, this metric also needs to be chosen on display!)
valyrian.l5secRE: Rolling average over the last 5 seconds of Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
valyrian.lLLP2HRratio: Last lap power to heartrate ratio
valyrian.lStepnumber: Current step number of a workout (not for F5x)
valyrian.lFontalertColorLow: Font color for power alerts, when under powerzone
valyrian.lgroundContactBalance: RunningDynamics instantaneous ground contact balance (0 - 100%, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
valyrian.lVAM_hour: Vertical speed averaged over the last 30 seconds (in meters/hour or feet/hour depending on watch settings)
valyrian.lpercFTP10s: Power averaged over 10 seconds in percentage of FTP
valyrian.loverruleWourkout: Use a static powerzone for alerts, not powerzones from workout steps
valyrian.ltempunits: Use Fahrenheit instead of Celsius for temperature metrics (Celsius is default)
valyrian.lCalcPwrTempcorrect: Calculated power correction percentage based on temperature
valyrian.lRealAltitude: Current altitude, for power correction based on altitude
valyrian.ldisablelabel3: Disable colored label for bottom left metric
valyrian.ldisablelabel2: Disable colored label for upper right metric
valyrian.ldisablelabel1: Disable colored label for upper left metric
valyrian.lApercMaxHR: Average HR in percentage of MaxHR
valyrian.ldisablelabel4: Disable colored label for bottom right metric
valyrian.lFTPHumid: Humidity in % by which Critical power or FTP is determined, for power correction based on humidity
valyrian.lFontalertColorHigh: Font color for power alerts, when above powerzone
valyrian.lHtarget: Upper power boundary of a workout step (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
valyrian.lPaceper3km: Pace averaged over the last 3 seconds
valyrian.lAverageSpeed: Average speed in km/mile per hour
valyrian.l5secPoweralert: Power averaged over the last 5 seconds
valyrian.lLLpercMaxHR: Last lap HR in percentage of MaxHR
valyrian.lrolavPacmaxsecs: Pace or/and speed averaged over the last ... seconds (max is 300 seconds)
valyrian.lPowper5sec: Power averaged over the last 5 seconds
valyrian.lgroundContactTime: RunningDynamics instantaneous ground contact time (in milliseconds, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
valyrian.lETAdeviation: Deviation from required finish in hours, minutes and seconds
valyrian.lLLPaceper100m: Pace of last lap in seconds per 100 meter (for track running)
valyrian.lDummysetting4version: Version 2.50 of Datarun premium with 4 metrics, copy 2 version (dummy setting)
valyrian.lLapSpeed: Lap speed in km/mile per hour
valyrian.lPaceper300km: Pace averaged over the last .. seconds (max is 300 seconds)
valyrian.lVertpace: Vertical speed averaged over the last 5 seconds
valyrian.lManPwrHumidcorrect: Correction based on manual set humidity
valyrian.lrolavPowmaxsecsError: This needs to be a number from 2 too 300
valyrian.lApercFTP: Average power in percentage of FTP
valyrian.lBacklight: Force backlight on, regardless of device settings
valyrian.lAlertbeep: Play sound as warning signal for operating out of powerzone
valyrian.lMilClockAltern: Alternative for default military clock in upper field
valyrian.lLpercMaxHR: Lap HR in percentage of MaxHR
valyrian.lReamingTimeOfStep: Remaining time or distance of the current step of a workout (not for F5x)
valyrian.lRCadence: Cadence in rotations per minute (for bike use)
valyrian.lShowRedClock: Show red clock over all metrics before the start of an activity (useful for a race when the normal clock isn't visible)
valyrian.lMaxColoringPace: Use 5 colors for coloring of pace field in middle row, instead of 3 colors
valyrian.lWeight: Weight in kilo's (needed for Running Effectiveness as used by Steve Palladino)
valyrian.lCurRE: Current Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
valyrian.lHperctarget: Upper power boundary of a workout step in % van FTP (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
valyrian.lAverage5secSpeed: Speed averaged over the last 5 seconds in km/mile per hour
valyrian.lFTP: Functional treshold power, needed for Intensity factor and Training stress score
valyrian.lrolavPacmaxsecsError: This needs to be a number from 2 too 300
valyrian.lAsecPower: Power averaged over the last 3 seconds
valyrian.lpercFTP3s: Power averaged over 3 seconds in percentage of FTP
valyrian.lLLSpeed: Last lap speed in km/mile per hour
valyrian.lLinecolor: Color of the lines that separate the metrics
valyrian.lverticalOscillation: RunningDynamics instantaneous vertical oscillation (in mm, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
valyrian.lWarningFreq: Frequency for the warning signal for operating out of powerzone
valyrian.lLperctarget: Lower power boundary of a workout step in % van FTP (not for F5x), from Training peaks etc, corrected by temperature/humidity/altitude if set in settings
valyrian.lFTPTemp: Temperature in F or C by which Critical power or FTP is determined, for power correction based on temperature
valyrian.lElapsed: Elapsed time (actual time minus start of timer moment)
valyrian.l3secPoweralert: Power averaged over the last 3 seconds
valyrian.lpercMaxHR: Current HR in percentage of MaxHR
valyrian.lPowper10sec: Power averaged over the last 10 seconds
valyrian.lLLpercFTP: Last lap power in percentage of FTP
valyrian.lRacedistanceTitle: Enter race distance in meters or thousands of a mile (imperial/statute watch settings) for estimated finish time
valyrian.lManPwrTempcorrect: Correction based on manual set temperature (manually set in settings)
valyrian.lETAfrompace: Estimated finished time based on average or last lap pace
valyrian.lTotalAscentinmperhour: Vertical ascent averaged over the whole activity (in meters/hour or feet/hour depending on watch settings)
valyrian.lpercFTP5s: Power averaged over 5 seconds in percentage of FTP
valyrian.lTempeCalibration: Calibration factor for Tempe temperature in tenths of degrees (3 means 0.3 added, -4 means 0.4 subtracted)
valyrian.lManTemp: Current temperature in F or C, for power correction based on temperature (manual setting instead of being delivered by Tempe)
valyrian.lPowerTarget: Powertarget in Watt, useful when power correction is set only to influence powertarget
valyrian.lPowper300km: Power averaged over the last .. seconds
valyrian.lverticalRatio: RunningDynamics vertical ratio (0 - 100%, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
valyrian.lrolavPowmaxsecs: Power averaged over the last ... seconds (max is 300 seconds)
valyrian.lCP: Critical power, needed for Running Stress Score
valyrian.lPPPowerZones: Power zones for 10 zone system, a format required like Power zones, a format required like 180:Z1:210:Z2:240:Z3:270:Z4:300:Z5:330:Z6:360:Z7:390:Z8:420:Z9:450:Z10:480
valyrian.lGarminColors: Use Garmin color scheme for label colors (not applicable for Palladino 10 powerzones)
valyrian.lstanceTime: RunningDynamics % ground contact time/stance time (0 - 100%, requires running pod, HRM-run or HRM-tri)
valyrian.lAverage3secSpeed: Speed averaged over the last 3 seconds in km/mile per hour
valyrian.lTotalAscentinmpermin: Vertical ascent averaged over the whole activity (in meters/minute or feet/minute depending on watch settings)
valyrian.l3secRE: Rolling average over the last 3 seconds of Running Effectiveness (as used by Steve Palladino)
valyrian.lManPwrAlticorrect: Correction based on manual set altitude
valyrian.lPwrAlticorrect: Correction based on altitude generated by barometer or GPS (watch decides independently which source it will be)
